channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street lighting not working, 17th December
item.description:
Hatherley Lane by the Miniature Railway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree blocking bridleway, 16th December
item.description:
There are multiple small trees down on the bridleway. There is one big tree blocking the whole pathway at the top of the bridleway just before the gate onto Cleeve Common. It is not passable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Satellite dish in watercourse, 16th December
item.description:
Satellite dish in watercourse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, Saint Georges Place, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes by bus stop, 16th December
item.description:
Uneven road surface and developing pot holes all along Gloucester Road and particularly bad by bus stop
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 202, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: C3 church, 16th December
item.description:
All street lamp haven’t been working for a long time. Needs addressing as it’s impossible to see the path!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road majorly perished at entrance to traveler camp, 16th December
item.description:
There are massive potholes to the side of the road by the entrance to the traveler camp on Kayte lane. The road is now difficult to pass as the holes are deep and can cause damage to cars. The whole area fills with water when it rains due to the banks having been built up causing further risk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously reported tree falling has no worsened resting on footbridge., 16th December
item.description:
Lower Farm Brockhampton Lane Swindon Village Cheltenham GL51 9RS Coordinates 51.93456 deg N, 2.08839 deg W

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The fallen tree is blocking the footpath. Please clear as soon as possible. Many thanks., 16th December
item.description:
It is at the back of 25 Brookway Drive on the footpath. It occurred during the recent storm - on 8 December 2024.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43a, Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 16th December
item.description:
NWDday with give an take please lift an replace x1 raised 900x600x20mm slab with tarmac due to tree roots damage with temporary footway closure needed no number 1 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 16th December
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet
